page.title: 15RELIGION IN THE AREA
page.content: On Sunday I go to Sunday school at the Methodist Church. My teacher is called Penny. In my group ther are Dominic, Kathleen, Zoe, Helen, Martin, Robert andie. We learn about God. We are going to have Sports Day on 20th July. You can go to girls' club: you play games. Every summer we have a holiday club. We do sponsored walks and sponsored silences. We try to win a medal by doing a Scripture exam. We sometimes go on trips: on the rec, to Clare country park and the railway. We pay 10p for girls' club and the same for Sunday school. Last year Sandra & Graham got married. We sang "Love is something if you give it away". There are C of E churches in the area & a RC church. There are no non-Christian places of worship.
